content.raw:
I did some ad-hoc testing driving round the navigation task example and running into things \(roslaunch vrx\_gazebo navigation\_task.launch verbose:=true\).  It seems to work well and is a great start on being able to keep track of collisions for the purposes of the contest.  

A couple of additional features that we might consider useful - could be future enhancements if not part of this PR.

* Keeping track of collisions.  Beyond counting the system should keep a record of the collisions.  Perhaps and array containing the list of collisions where each collision is a time-stamp and the name of the other object involved in the collision.  
* Reporting collisions via ROS API to relay some of the information from the Gazebo contacts information.  Would think that the message would contain names of the two collision objects and a timestamp.

Thoughts?
